data.eml:eml: Subspecies-level systematics and affinities of Cheimas Thieme - an endemic genus of the subparamo of the Venezuelan Cordillera de Mérida (Lepidoptera: Nymphalidae, Satyrinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pyrcz, Tomasz W., Lorenc-Brudecka, Jadwiga, Boyer, Pierre, Zubek, Anna (2018): Subspecies-level systematics and affinities of Cheimas Thieme - an endemic genus of the subparamo of the Venezuelan Cordillera de Mérida (Lepidoptera: Nymphalidae, Satyrinae). Zootaxa 4422 (2): 219-243, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4422.2.4
